function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Physical and social aspects of servicescapes may contribute to the propagation of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreak in service environments.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, social distancing measures, and regular disinfection of the environment.","Technologies":"Smart disinfection systems, contactless service technology.","People":"Customers, employees, local community members.","Owner":"Business owners, service providers, local community organizations."},{"Description":"Engagement with local community members and institutions can create opportunities for disease spread if proper precautions are not taken.","Impact":"Potential for diseases to spread within informal networks and community interactions.","Mitigation":"Educate community members on disease prevention, prioritize safety protocols in community engagements.","Technologies":"Community health education programs, contact-tracing technology.","People":"Local business owners, community members, volunteers.","Owner":"Local community organizations, public health authorities."}]}
